front.title: Implementing A+P in the provider's IPv6-only network

abstract.t: This memo describes an implementation of A+P in the provider's IPv6- only network. It provides an overview of the implementation environment which consists of network elements and configurations, and the results of the application compatibility test to verify the feasibility of deploying A+P in the IPv6-only network and to assess the impacts on services and also the viability of A+P proposed approach. This memo focuses on the IPv6 flavor of A+P.
